subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Not ordinary some old stuff voices.
author: Wiliam Clarke
full_text:
--0-150128653-1209590606=:44736
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

I heard something different, but my ears aren't always in tune.  I heard "your the wife alley in marriage", but who knows.

Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:          From; http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Count_of_St_Germain
 
'Saint Germain is always associated with the color violet, the jewel amethyst, and the Maltese cross rendered in violet (usually the iron cross style cross patee version); he is also regarded as the 'Chohan of the Seventh Ray'[13] � according to Theosophy, the Seven Rays are seven metaphysical principles that govern both individual souls and the unfolding of each 2,158 year long Astrological Age. Since according to Theosophy the next Astrological Age, the Age of Aquarius, will be governed by the Seventh (Violet) Ray (the Ray of Ceremonial Order), Saint Germain is sometimes called 'The Hierarch of the Age of Aquarius'. According to the Ascended Master Teachings, Saint Germain is 'The God of Freedom for the Earth'.'
 
 Much to do with the Purple Princess, and the seven. I don't mean to sell others short, I just get a different level, and find regular "this your auntie" type EVPs kinda useless. Mostly I don't post every voice I get, just the ones that I thought was outstanding, but no one else hears.
 
Frank-S

I heard something different, but my ears aren't always in tune.  I heard "your the wife alley in marriage", but who knows.<BR><BR><B><I>Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...></I></B> wrote:  <BLOCKQUOTE class=replbq style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: #1010ff 2px solid">  <DIV id=ygrp-text>  <div>From; <A href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Count_of_St_Germain">http://en.wikipedia<WBR>.org/wiki/<WBR>Count_of_<WBR>St_Germain</A><BR> <BR>'Saint Germain is always associated with the color <A title="Violet (color)" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Violet_%28color%29"><U><FONT color=#0000ff>violet</FONT></U></A>, the jewel <A title=Amethyst
 href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Amethyst"><U><FONT color=#0000ff>amethyst</FONT></U></A>, and the <I><A title="Maltese cross" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maltese_cross"><U><FONT color=#0000ff>Maltese cross</FONT></U></A></I> rendered in violet (usually the <I>iron cross style cross patee</I> version); he is also regarded as the 'Chohan of the Seventh Ray'<SUP class=reference id=cite_ref-12><A title="" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Count_of_St_Germain#cite_note-12"><U><FONT color=#800080>[13]</FONT></U></A></SUP> � according to <A title=Theosophy href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Theosophy"><U><FONT color=#0000ff>Theosophy</FONT></U></A>, the <A class=mw-redirect title="Seven Rays" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seven_Rays"><U><FONT color=#0000ff>Seven Rays</FONT></U></A> are seven metaphysical principles that govern both individual souls and the unfolding of each 2,158 year long <A class=mw-redirect title="Astrological Age"
 href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Astrological_Age"><U><FONT color=#0000ff>Astrological Age</FONT></U></A>. Since according to Theosophy the next <A class=mw-redirect title="Astrological Age" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Astrological_Age"><U><FONT color=#0000ff>Astrological Age</FONT></U></A>, the <A class=mw-redirect title="Age of Aquarius" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Age_of_Aquarius"><U><FONT color=#0000ff>Age of Aquarius</FONT></U></A>, will be governed by the Seventh (Violet) Ray (the Ray of Ceremonial Order), Saint Germain is sometimes called '<I>The Hierarch of the Age of Aquarius</I>'. According to the <A title="Ascended Master Teachings" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ascended_Master_Teachings"><U><FONT color=#0000ff>Ascended Master Teachings</FONT></U></A>, Saint Germain is '<I>The God of Freedom for the Earth</I>'.'<BR> <BR> Much to do with the Purple Princess, and the seven. I don't mean to sell others short, I just get a different
